title: WESTCOAST / GARY
description: Gary the Cryptofascist is a friend of Morell's. Also trying to find the cryptid. Wears armour stolen from the hanged man under his clothes. Has Man from Hjelmdall books etc.

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Always a pleasure to see an office..."
dialogueTree.text: "Always a pleasure to see an officer of the law!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I mean…" He turns toward Kim. "Off..."
links.text: "I mean…" He turns toward Kim. "Officers."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim...."
links.text: "Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim. "I mean... officer."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Once more you hear that odd clickin..."
links.text: Once more you hear that odd clicking sound coming from Gary.

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Very generous of you to help us ou..."
dialogueTree.text: "Very generous of you to help us out, officer. I'm sure glad to be back from that little excursion."

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Boy, am I ever so grateful to you,..."
dialogueTree.text: "Boy, am I ever so grateful to you, officer! But I'm not the only one who wants to thank you..." He nods toward Lena.

links.title: You: ""I'll talk to her then." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I'll talk to her then." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Very generous of you to help us ou..."
dialogueTree.text: "Very generous of you to help us out, officer. I'm sure glad to be back from that little excursion."

links.title: You: ""Not a lover of the great outdoors?""
links.text: "Not a lover of the great outdoors?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I like nature, just not this blood..."
links.text: "I like nature, just not this bloody coast. It's mostly drunks and degenerates that come here."

links.title: Drama: "This man respects authority too muc..."
links.text: This man respects authority too much to see you for what you are. Pretend thou art a sober man!

links.title: You: ""I am neither of those things, I ca..."
links.text: "I am neither of those things, I can assure you. I'm a by-the-books, clean-as-a-whistle, teetotaling officer. I'm not even tempted to touch intoxicants."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I've been tempted on occasion." He..."
links.text: "I've been tempted on occasion." He nods gravely. "But someone has to stay strong for Revachol." His gaze shifts to the floor tiles.

links.title: Authority: "*Serious* question time. This man i..."
links.text: *Serious* question time. This man is no innocent. No one is.

links.title: You: ""Degenerates? I've been trained to..."
links.text: "Degenerates? I've been trained to identify the slightest hint of degeneracy by the pre-eminent authority on it."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, uh... I didn't mean it in any..."
links.text: "Oh, uh... I didn't mean it in any *scientific* way." His gaze shifts nervously to the floor tiles.

links.title: You: ""Drunks and degenerates -- that's m..."
links.text: "Drunks and degenerates -- that's my crew!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Dark times will do that to good me..."
links.text: "Dark times will do that to good men." He nods gravely, then shifts his gaze to the floor tiles.

links.title: You: ""Sadly, I think I might be a drunk...."
links.text: "Sadly, I think I might be a drunk. Or a degenerate. Maybe even both..."

links.title: You: ""Nobody's perfect. Have you never b..."
links.text: "Nobody's perfect. Have you never been tempted to drink?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, I've been tempted." He nods gr..."
links.text: "Oh, I've been tempted." He nods gravely. "But someone has to stay strong for Revachol." His gaze shifts to the floor tiles.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm more of a city boy too.""
links.text: "Yeah, I'm more of a city boy too."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I really owe you one for getting u..."
dialogueTree.text: "I really owe you one for getting us out of those reeds, officer. Finally got all that soot out of my hair. Name's Gary."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim...."
links.text: "Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim. "I mean... officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrows..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrows slightly and takes out his notebook.

links.title: Logic: "Yellow Man? Might this be the owner..."
links.text: Yellow Man? Might this be the owner of that mug you found in the trash? This is something to ask him about, after a little probing first...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yellow Man! That sounds awfully fam..."
links.text: Yellow Man! That sounds awfully familiar. Something to ask about later?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yellow Man? Feels significant someh..."
links.text: Yellow Man? Feels significant somehow, him saying that. You should ask him about it, later...

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello, officer! Name's Gary. Boy,..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello, officer! Name's Gary. Boy, am I ever so grateful to you! But I'm not the only one who wants to thank you..." He nods toward Lena.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello again! Very generous of you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again! Very generous of you to help us out, officer. I can't wait to get out of here."

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Always a pleasure to see an office..."
dialogueTree.text: "Always a pleasure to see an officer of the law!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He turns toward Kim. "I mean... *of..."
links.text: He turns toward Kim. "I mean... *officers*."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim...."
links.text: "Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim. "I mean... officer."

links.title: You: ""Gary, do you know how to turn back..."
links.text: "Gary, do you know how to turn back time?"

links.title: Logic: "Yellow Man? Interesting. This is so..."
links.text: Yellow Man? Interesting. This is something to ask him about, after a little probing first...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yellow Man! That sounds awfully fam..."
links.text: Yellow Man! That sounds awfully familiar. Something to keep in mind for later...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yellow Man? Feels significant someh..."
links.text: Yellow Man? Feels significant somehow, him saying that. You should ask him about it, later...

links.title: You: ""You said 'Revakhol'?""
links.text: "You said 'Revakhol'?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I like to pronounce it the *hard*..."
links.text: "I like to pronounce it the *hard* way. The old way. The Vespertine way." He nods solemnly.

links.title: Logic: "The *stupid* way?"
links.text: The *stupid* way?

links.title: Suggestion: "He winks at you, trying to relay so..."
links.text: He winks at you, trying to relay some hidden message. Inviting you to mispronounce it too perhaps? It's odd.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's a secret rite. A very fringe-n..."
links.text: It's a secret rite. A very fringe-nationalist handshake, probably.

links.title: Endurance: "Garbage. You're a *true* patriot an..."
links.text: Garbage. You're a *true* patriot and you know how it's said. The Suresne way. The *fine* way. With an elegant shhh...

links.title: Endurance: "But still... he's definitely one of..."
links.text: But still... he's definitely one of us. Longs for the Old Days - the *Old Ways*. He's likely to know how to turn back time. Ask him!

links.title: You: ""Do you know anything about the man..."
links.text: "Do you know anything about the man hanged behind the Whirling-in-Rags?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I told you everything -- I just to..."
links.text: "I told you everything -- I just took the cuirass that's all. I promise. I don't know anything else."

links.title: Drama: "'Tis true sire. This man simply did..."
links.text: 'Tis true sire. This man simply did not know what he was getting caught up in.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I told you everything I know, sir...."
links.text: "I told you everything I know, sir. I'm *truly* sorry for the mug, but I have nothing to do with that." He shifts uncomfortably in his clothes.

links.title: Composure: "He's not feeling too comfortable in..."
links.text: He's not feeling too comfortable in his own skin. Odd, I'd say.

links.title: Drama: "Uncomfortable shifting around doesn..."
links.text: Uncomfortable shifting around doesn't make him the killer, though. It's something else.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, so *that's* what the RCM in Ma..."
links.text: "Oh, so *that's* what the RCM in Martinaise is about? Great." He nods in sincere approval. "Great to hear someone's finally taking care of that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you *do* know something about i..."
links.text: "So you *do* know something about it?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""No, no," he shakes his head emphat..."
links.text: "No, no," he shakes his head emphatically. Then corrects his tie. "Nothing. He was some kind of mercenary, but everyone here knows that... I'm just glad to hear you're looking into it, that's all."

links.title: Composure: "He's not feeling very comfy in his..."
links.text: He's not feeling very comfy in his clothes, is he? Strange...

links.title: Drama: "He didn't *kill* him or anything, b..."
links.text: He didn't *kill* him or anything, but there's something going on here.

links.title: You: ""So you *do* know something about i..."
links.text: "So you *do* know something about it?"

links.title: You: ""All right.""
links.text: "All right."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Maybe I can help you with somethin..."
links.text: "Maybe I can help you with something else? I keep my nose out of affairs like that. I'm a decent man."

links.title: You: ""Is this your mug?" (Hold up the Ye..."
links.text: "Is this your mug?" (Hold up the Yellow Man Mug.)

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Okay, but... I told you everything..."
links.text: "Okay, but... I told you everything. What else can I say?"

links.title: You: ""How did you get into the trash con..."
links.text: "How did you get into the trash container?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I know a guy who works with trash..."
links.text: "I know a guy who works with trash collection services -- CS Municipal. He gave me a master key for the trash containers of Martinaise."

links.title: You: ""Why would you need to get into eve..."
links.text: "Why would you need to get into everyone's trash?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""So I can use the Whirling's trash..."
links.text: "So I can use the Whirling's trash compactor to store my own stuff," he says, bowing shamefully like a fallen knight. "Garbage disposal is expensive as hell, the damn Himeans run it like a mob..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm sorry, okay? I thought I could..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, okay? I thought I could cut costs. I shouldn't have. I shouldn't have disgraced myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Disgraced?" The lieutenant raises..."
links.text: "Disgraced?" The lieutenant raises his eyebrows and looks up. "No need for the histrionics, sir. It was, after all, just a trash container."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He studies his reaction. Gary doesn..."
links.text: He studies his reaction. Gary doesn't answer.

links.title: You: ""Gary, did you put the clothes of a..."
links.text: "Gary, did you put the clothes of a murder victim -- the man who was hanged behind the Whirling-in-Rags -- into that trash container?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Officer, please..." He raises both..."
links.text: "Officer, please..." He raises both hands. "Let me explain. It's not like *that...*"

links.title: You: ""Do.""
links.text: "Do."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I was only cleaning up. I live rig..."
links.text: "I was only cleaning up. I live right across the yard from where he was hanged and I saw him stripped naked. All the clothes lying around in the yard, smelling... People are animals, you know..."

links.title: You: ""Yes-yes. What happened?""
links.text: "Yes-yes. What happened?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Then I came out to clean up the ra..."
links.text: "Then I came out to clean up the rags because *no one else would*. I put them into the Whirling's trash -- along with a broken mug, admittedly..." He changes his mind mid-sentence.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Okay, I was coming to throw the mu..."
links.text: "Okay, I was coming to throw the mug away and, well, I threw the mug there and the clothes too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right, it was just *civic duty*,"..."
links.text: "Right, it was just *civic duty*," the lieutenant remarks drolly.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Exactly! That's exactly what it wa..."
links.text: "Exactly! That's exactly what it was -- civic duty."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "As he shifts uncomfortably, a serie..."
links.text: As he shifts uncomfortably, a series of clicks, like the clinking of glass beads against one another as they roll across a hardwood floor. You've heard this sound before, but where?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "As he shifts uncomfortably, a serie..."
links.text: As he shifts uncomfortably, a series of clicks, like the clinking of glass beads against one another as they roll across a hardwood floor. A strange sound.

links.title: You: ""Okay. Then what happened?""
links.text: "Okay. Then what happened?"

links.title: You: ""What's that strange sound?""
links.text: "What's that strange sound?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""What... sound?""
links.text: "What... sound?"

links.title: You: ""That clinking I just heard when yo..."
links.text: "That clinking I just heard when you moved."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Really?" He fans his arms out slow..."
links.text: "Really?" He fans his arms out slowly, and, this time, his motions are soundless.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""There's lots of weird stuff out he..."
links.text: "There's lots of weird stuff out here in the reeds, though -- insects, trash. Could be the wind shifting some garbage nearby."

links.title: You: ""Don't mess with me. I think you kn..."
links.text: "Don't mess with me. I think you know what I'm talking about."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I haven't the slightest. There's l..."
links.text: "I haven't the slightest. There's lots of weird stuff out here in the reeds, though -- insects, trash. Could be the wind shifting some garbage nearby."

links.title: Logic: "Maybe it *was* pinball?"
links.text: Maybe it *was* pinball?

links.title: Shivers: "Every day, the wind shifts the reed..."
links.text: Every day, the wind shifts the reeds and whatever was left in them: tambourines and condom wrappers, plastic and glass bottles, the smell of decay.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The sound you heard was not the sou..."
links.text: The sound you heard was not the sound of something easily abandoned.

links.title: You: ""You wouldn't know anything about t..."
links.text: "You wouldn't know anything about the victim's missing armour would you?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Armour? No." He changes his mind...."
links.text: "Armour? No." He changes his mind. "I mean -- yes, of course. I know he was wearing armour. But I don't know anything *about* it..."

links.title: Drama: "An infant could see he's not tellin..."
links.text: An infant could see he's not telling the truth -- but he's too scared to admit more wrongdoing.

links.title: Composure: "There's something going on here. Yo..."
links.text: There's something going on here. You should observe him more closely, after this topic is concluded.

links.title: You: ""Let's move on -- for now." (Conclu..."
links.text: "Let's move on -- for now." (Conclude.)

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""All right. Of course, officer.""
links.text: "All right. Of course, officer."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I hope I could help your investiga..."
links.text: "I hope I could help your investigation, in my small way." He's visibly relieved it's over.

links.title: Half Light: "Don't be so relieved yet, Gary. Thi..."
links.text: Don't be so relieved yet, Gary. This bad cop may have been in *your* apartment, admiring your mug collection. Perhaps a little intimidation?

links.title: Logic: "Hmm, does this mean you were in *hi..."
links.text: Hmm, does this mean you were in *his* apartment, admiring *his* colonial mug collection? Perhaps it would be *interesting* to tell him...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, does this mean you've been in..."
links.text: Wait, does this mean you've been in his apartment? On Evrart's behalf? That was *his* colonial mug collection -- perhaps this could soften him up further.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""My... mug? Why would you think tha..."
links.text: "My... mug? Why would you think that?"

links.title: Composure: "His eyes widened at the sight of th..."
links.text: His eyes widened at the sight of the mug. He's seen it before alright.

links.title: You: ""You said 'Yellow Man'. That's not..."
links.text: "You said 'Yellow Man'. That's not something many people go around saying."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Really? I hear it all the time. Al..."
links.text: "Really? I hear it all the time. All in jest, of course. No offence meant to anyone."

links.title: You: ""Just admit it, man. You put the mu..."
links.text: "Just admit it, man. You put the mug in the trash container behind the Whirling."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Maybe... okay, yes. I did. I know..."
links.text: "Maybe... okay, yes. I did. I know I shouldn't have, and I am very sorry, officer." He pauses. "You're not going to fine me, are you?"

links.title: You: ""I would -- but I don't know *how*.""
links.text: "I would -- but I don't know *how*."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""There is no need, officer, I won't..."
links.text: "There is no need, officer, I won't do it again. Besides, my pay, it's... I'm barely getting by as it is with those Kojkos edging on the delivery business, sir. Please..."

links.title: Authority: "Embarrassing. You should know what..."
links.text: Embarrassing. You should know what a misconduct fine is by now. Make it up by being especially *unkind* to him in future dealings.

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""What did you do, Gary?""
links.text: "What did you do, Gary?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Nothing! Nothing... just answering..."
links.text: "Nothing! Nothing... just answering some questions. Helping out the law..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Here we go. Start pumping that swee..."
links.text: Here we go. Start pumping that sweet info.

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""WHAT DID YOU DO, GARY?!""
links.text: "WHAT DID YOU DO, GARY?!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""NOTHING! Nothing... just answering..."
links.text: "NOTHING! Nothing... just answering some questions. Helping out the law..."

links.title: You: ""I would -- but I don't know *how.*..."
links.text: "I would -- but I don't know *how.* How do I fine someone, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Using a standard form, officer." T..."
links.text: "Using a standard form, officer." The lieutenant pulls out a sheet of carbon copy paper, scribbles something on it, then tears out the bottom page and hands it to Gary.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's 50 reál," he explains. "You'r..."
links.text: "It's 50 reál," he explains. "You're getting off easy. In return, we expect *information*. You have questions to answer, sir."

links.title: You: ""I am..." (Rip out a fine slip.) "F..."
links.text: "I am..." (Rip out a fine slip.) "For 20 reál."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Okay, I deserve that -- and I won'..."
links.text: "Okay, I deserve that -- and I won't do it again." He accepts the slip of copy paper with a bow. "You have my word."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I don't know what got *into* me. S..."
links.text: "I don't know what got *into* me. Stuffing my garbage in another man's property, it's... I've been having trouble at work lately. The Kojkos are price dumping us out of competition."

links.title: You: ""I am..." (Rip out a fine slip.) "F..."
links.text: "I am..." (Rip out a fine slip.) "For 100 reál."

links.title: You: ""I am." (Rip out a fine slip.) "For..."
links.text: "I am." (Rip out a fine slip.) "For 250 reál -- the maximum."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh god, 250? How am I gonna pay th..."
links.text: "Oh god, 250? How am I gonna pay that?" He looks at the slip of yellow copy paper, then gets a hold of himself. "Okay. I'll work harder. I'll pay it off, I promise."

links.title: Logic: "This is a considerable expense to h..."
links.text: This is a considerable expense to him. One month's wage, most likely.

links.title: Volition: "It's, in a way, admirable how quick..."
links.text: It's, in a way, admirable how quickly he composes himself after such a blow. This man digs authority. Even when it's bullying him.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""And I'll *never* do it again. I do..."
links.text: "And I'll *never* do it again. I don't know what got into me, really... work has been stressful lately. Damn Kojkos price dumping us out of competition."

links.title: You: ""Nah, Gary. I just want information.""
links.text: "Nah, Gary. I just want information."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Whooh," he's visibly relieved. "Th..."
links.text: "Whooh," he's visibly relieved. "Thank you, you won't regret this. I won't use another man's property to dump my garbage *ever* again."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I don't know what got into me, rea..."
links.text: "I don't know what got into me, really... work has been stressful lately. Damn Kojkos price dumping us out of competition."

links.title: You: ""Still seems suspicious. Did I ment..."
links.text: "Still seems suspicious. Did I mention the mug was found at the scene of a lynching?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Okay, okay, I admit it. I threw th..."
links.text: "Okay, okay, I admit it. I threw the mug away in the trash container behind the hostel. I know I shouldn't have, and I am very sorry, officer." He pauses.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""You're not going to fine me, are y..."
links.text: "You're not going to fine me, are you?"

links.title: You: ""Alright, I believe you. You look l..."
links.text: "Alright, I believe you. You look like the kind of man who knows it's a *crime* to lie to an officer."

links.title: You: ""It seemed as if you were calling t..."
links.text: "It seemed as if you were calling to it *longingly* when you cried 'Yellow Man'!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, no, that's not... why would I..."
links.text: "Oh, no, that's not... why would I be calling to a broken mug?"

links.title: You: ""I can *see* you recognize it. It's..."
links.text: "I can *see* you recognize it. It's in your eyes."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I may have had a similar-looking m..."
links.text: "I may have had a similar-looking mug in the past, that's all."

links.title: You: ""You look like the kind of guy who..."
links.text: "You look like the kind of guy who might have a *collection* of mugs like this. Home -- in his *colonial mug collection*."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""How do you mean? Forgive me, offic..."
links.text: "How do you mean? Forgive me, officer, but we've only just met."

links.title: Drama: "He is trying to avoid lying to you..."
links.text: He is trying to avoid lying to you outright in case you really have been to his apartment.

links.title: Half Light: "He's trying not to look afraid, bec..."
links.text: He's trying not to look afraid, because that would be incriminating. Yet he *is*.

links.title: You: ""Are you a cryptozoologist too?""
links.text: "Are you a cryptozoologist too?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""No-no... I help Morell with resear..."
links.text: "No-no... I help Morell with research sometimes and I've learned some things along the way. But I don't usually go in for picnics like this on my own."

links.title: Conceptualization: "After all this time with Morell, he..."
links.text: After all this time with Morell, he must have an opinion on cryptids -- this could lead to a good one.

links.title: You: ""I'm into cryptids. Do you have a f..."
links.text: "I'm into cryptids. Do you have a favourite?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, yes! The Burning Rhino. Morell..."
links.text: "Oh, yes! The Burning Rhino. Morell doubts he's real, but I don't much care -- because I won't be the one looking for him out in Safre Serai."

links.title: You: ""What's a Burning Rhino?""
links.text: "What's a Burning Rhino?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""A rhinoceros that looks ordinary d..."
links.text: "A rhinoceros that looks ordinary during the day, but burns brightly by night. Well, at least the males do."

links.title: You: ""How do they burn?""
links.text: "How do they burn?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""They have special ducts just above..."
links.text: "They have special ducts just above their shoulder blades that secrete a combustible fluid. When the rhino is just beginning to light itself, it looks as though it has wings of fire."

links.title: Logic: "But how is this combustible fluid l..."
links.text: But how is this combustible fluid lit?

links.title: You: ""How does the lighting of this... f..."
links.text: "How does the lighting of this... fluid actually work?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""The rhino starts running very fast..."
links.text: "The rhino starts running very fast to build heat, then stops, raises its head -- and sparks fly from its neck, setting its back ablaze."

links.title: You: ""This seems unlikely.""
links.text: "This seems unlikely."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yeah, well -- Revachol used to be..."
links.text: "Yeah, well -- Revachol used to be flaming rhino once, a long time ago..." he says and then pauses, thoughtfully. "That seems unlikely too, doesn't it?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Super solid argument, Gary. Can't a..."
links.text: Super solid argument, Gary. Can't argue with that.

links.title: You: ""I can buy into that. A flaming rhi..."
links.text: "I can buy into that. A flaming rhino."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Revachol used to be flaming rhino..."
links.text: "Revachol used to be flaming rhino once, a long time ago..." he says and then pauses, thoughtfully.

links.title: You: ""I want to be just like that rhino,..."
links.text: "I want to be just like that rhino, running through the night with guns blazing!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We don't really do that around her..."
links.text: "We don't really do that around here."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Perhaps we should have more such *..."
links.text: "Perhaps we should have more such *decisive action* in Revachol. You know -- this city used to be flaming rhino once, a long time ago..." he says and then pauses, thoughtfully.

links.title: You: "Never mind."
links.text: Never mind.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Mhm, I imagine it's quite a sight,..."
links.text: "Mhm, I imagine it's quite a sight," the man crosses his arms confidently.

links.title: You: ""Why only the males?""
links.text: "Why only the males?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""The flames are not just for decora..."
links.text: "The flames are not just for decoration. They are an integral part of the beast's mating behaviour."

links.title: You: ""How so?""
links.text: "How so?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""During the Burning Rhino's mating..."
links.text: "During the Burning Rhino's mating season, herds of male rhinos, all aflame, encircle herds of female rhinos, forming a fiery ring as they begin to copulate, loudly."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Local peasants call it the Passion..."
links.text: "Local peasants call it the Passion Ring. They fear the rhinos. As, perhaps, they should. Anyway..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs without lookin..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs without looking up from his notes.

links.title: Empathy: "It's clear the burning rhino is dea..."
links.text: It's clear the burning rhino is dear to him on many levels. Some even *spiritual*.

links.title: You: ""What do you do, then? If not crypt..."
links.text: "What do you do, then? If not cryptozoology?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, this and that." He grins."
links.text: "Oh, this and that." He grins.

links.title: You: ""Sounds intriguing.""
links.text: "Sounds intriguing."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Sometimes.""
links.text: "Sometimes."

links.title: Authority: "See? He's being evasive. Shake him..."
links.text: See? He's being evasive. Shake him up, show him who's boss.

links.title: You: ""That's not an answer.""
links.text: "That's not an answer."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I just didn't want to bore you wit..."
links.text: "I just didn't want to bore you with unnecessary detail, officer."

links.title: You: "Let it go."
links.text: Let it go.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Okay, I work as a special courier...."
links.text: "Okay, I work as a special courier." He smiles. "You know, urgent deliveries, overnight deliveries, deliveries to out-of-the-way locations."

links.title: You: ""Sounds shady.""
links.text: "Sounds shady."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Officer, I would never. I just did..."
links.text: "Officer, I would never. I just didn't want to bore you with unnecessary detail."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I work as a special courier. You k..."
links.text: "I work as a special courier. You know, urgent deliveries, overnight deliveries, deliveries to out-of-the-way locations."

links.title: You: ""So you deliver things. What kinds..."
links.text: "So you deliver things. What kinds of things?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, I don't know the contents, off..."
links.text: "Oh, I don't know the contents, officer. Part of my job is discretion."

links.title: Composure: "He's trying too hard to seem untrou..."
links.text: He's trying too hard to seem untroubled by your question. The rigidity in his posture gives him away.

links.title: You: ""Do you deliver drugs?""
links.text: "Do you deliver drugs?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""No, no, that's far too dangerous...."
links.text: "No, no, that's far too dangerous. Besides, dealing drugs isn't for people like me and you, officer."

links.title: You: ""Do you deliver guns?""
links.text: "Do you deliver guns?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""No, nothing like that. I leave tha..."
links.text: "No, nothing like that. I leave that to companies with hundreds of years of tradition in arms manufacturing. No need for an amateur like me cutting in."

links.title: You: ""Do you deliver letters to the secr..."
links.text: "Do you deliver letters to the secret mistresses of corporate and government officials?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""What do I look like, a pansy? Besi..."
links.text: "What do I look like, a pansy? Besides, that kind of cavorting goes against the community values that would strengthen our city."

links.title: Suggestion: "You're a simple cop asking a simple..."
links.text: You're a simple cop asking a simple question. He can't beat around the bush much longer.

links.title: You: ""Come on, man. You're not under sus..."
links.text: "Come on, man. You're not under suspicion yet, but you will be if you keep evading questions."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He sighs. "Okay, fine, you got me...."
links.text: He sighs. "Okay, fine, you got me. I'm a special *topping pie* delivery courier."

links.title: You: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""You heard me. I deliver topping pi..."
links.text: "You heard me. I deliver topping pies. It's temporary. I'm looking for another job. Not many jobs for good men out there these days."

links.title: You: ""You said you deliver *special* top..."
links.text: "You said you deliver *special* topping pies. What makes these topping pies special?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""They're wheat-free. And vegan. And..."
links.text: "They're wheat-free. And vegan. And... *huge*." He pauses.

links.title: Suggestion: "He's thinking of a way to gain some..."
links.text: He's thinking of a way to gain some advantage from his embarrassing situation.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""That's basically it. I'm a pie del..."
links.text: "That's basically it. I'm a pie delivery man. How about we change the subject?"

links.title: Endurance: "Yum. Did someone say topping pie?"
links.text: Yum. Did someone say topping pie?

links.title: You: ""How about you deliver *me* a toppi..."
links.text: "How about you deliver *me* a topping pie?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Sure. If you want, I could hook yo..."
links.text: "Sure. If you want, I could hook you up with some topping pie no problem."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Sure. If you want, I could get you..."
links.text: "Sure. If you want, I could get you one for free if we ever meet in the city, officer. Wheat free. Just ask me later."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's change it.""
links.text: "Okay, let's change it."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He looks around, half-ashamed, half..."
links.text: He looks around, half-ashamed, half-relieved.

links.title: Endurance: "I'm satisfied. Are you satisfied? B..."
links.text: I'm satisfied. Are you satisfied? Because I am.

links.title: You: ""Oh, I guess that's okay then." (Co..."
links.text: "Oh, I guess that's okay then." (Conclude.)

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He smiles broadly."
links.text: He smiles broadly.

links.title: You: ""As long you're making ends meet an..."
links.text: "As long you're making ends meet and advancing your career objectives."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm doing all I can in this econom..."
links.text: "I'm doing all I can in this economy, officer."

links.title: You: ""Fascinating. Let's talk about some..."
links.text: "Fascinating. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes, officer?""
links.text: "Yes, officer?"

links.title: Authority: "What *does* he do then? This feels..."
links.text: What *does* he do then? This feels like a good opportunity to DOMINATE him.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There *probably* is a follow-up to..."
links.text: There *probably* is a follow-up to this, but you can't think of any. Doesn't matter. Waste of time anyway. Gotta keep moving.

links.title: You: ""You were *surprised* to see my col..."
links.text: "You were *surprised* to see my colleague, Lieutenant Kitsuragi."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm sorry for what I said," he rep..."
links.text: "I'm sorry for what I said," he replies, then falls silent.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Short means sincere in these things..."
links.text: Short means sincere in these things.

links.title: Authority: "This man is truly sorry for underes..."
links.text: This man is truly sorry for underestimating the honour and military might of the Seolite man.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Not many Seolites here, or anywher..."
links.text: "Not many Seolites here, or anywhere, other than Seol. I meant no offence, truly."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you remember how when we met Me..."
links.text: "Do you remember how when we met Measurehead and I said the next racist will be the *really* good one?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." He gestures toward Gary a..."
links.text: "Well..." He gestures toward Gary as though he were presenting a work of art. "*This* is that racist."

links.title: Endurance: "Deep satisfying rumble runs through..."
links.text: Deep satisfying rumble runs through your small intestine. It feels affirming.

links.title: You: ""Yes! Our *lucky* racist.""
links.text: "Yes! Our *lucky* racist."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hey, man." He blushes. "All I mean..."
links.text: "Hey, man." He blushes. "All I meant was there are not many Seolites around here. I'm just stating a fact."

links.title: Endurance: "Oh yeah, he's definitely one of us...."
links.text: Oh yeah, he's definitely one of us. Smart one too, tactical. He might very well know how to turn back time. Ask him!

links.title: You: ""Will you grant us three wishes, Ga..."
links.text: "Will you grant us three wishes, Gary?"

links.title: You: ""Are you, Gary? Are you a racist?""
links.text: "Are you, Gary? Are you a racist?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know. I liked the previous..."
links.text: "I don't know. I liked the previous racists better."

links.title: You: ""He is nothing compared to Measureh..."
links.text: "He is nothing compared to Measurehead."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I don't know who that is..." He bl..."
links.text: "I don't know who that is..." He blushes. "But all I meant was there are not many Seolites around here."

links.title: You: ""I think so. Sorry, as you know, I'..."
links.text: "I think so. Sorry, as you know, I've been having problems with my memory..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At any rate," he gestures toward G..."
links.text: "At any rate," he gestures toward Gary as though he were presenting a work of art, "*this* is that racist."

links.title: You: ""Do you have a problem with Seolite..."
links.text: "Do you have a problem with Seolites?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""No, no problem at all." He flashes..."
links.text: "No, no problem at all." He flashes an impenetrable smile at the lieutenant.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Sounds like some conspiracy topic...."
links.text: Sounds like some conspiracy topic. You might be able to discuss it with him when the lieutenant isn't here. *If* you can remember it.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Return without the lieutenant -- fo..."
links.text: Return without the lieutenant -- for this? Your balance organ thinks it's a waste of time.

links.title: Endurance: "Your *gut feeling* tells you it'd b..."
links.text: Your *gut feeling* tells you it'd be interesting.

links.title: You: ""Because they're not really human,..."
links.text: "Because they're not really human, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks up at you, sig..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks up at you, sighs, and goes back to his notes.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""That's not what I was implying at..."
links.text: "That's not what I was implying at all..." He eyes the lieutenant nervously. "But, of course, you're just kidding, officer."

links.title: You: ""The lieutenant is a native of Reva..."
links.text: "The lieutenant is a native of Revachol."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, yes, of course he is. I was ju..."
links.text: "Oh, yes, of course he is. I was just speaking about his... connections." He flashes an impenetrable smile. "Let's change the subject, okay?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. What *are* they doing in that..."
links.text: "Yes. What *are* they doing in that Seol of theirs? Scheming?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks up at you, alm..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks up at you, almost sadly.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh no. Nothing like that. *Definit..."
links.text: "Oh no. Nothing like that. *Definitely* not scheming." He flashes an impenetrable smile.

links.title: You: ""You said you'd tell me about Seoli..."
links.text: "You said you'd tell me about Seolites, when Kim isn't here. He isn't here."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Man, I don't wanna talk about that..."
links.text: "Man, I don't wanna talk about that... I was wrong to bring it up at all. Shouldn't have said those things about your partner..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Most of the Seolites may be shifty..."
links.text: "Most of the Seolites may be shifty, but the ones in Revachol have always been loyal to Revachol -- and the Suzerain too. I..." He trails off.

links.title: Lena, the Cryptozoologist's wife: ""It's for the best, dear. Lay that..."
links.text: "It's for the best, dear. Lay that story to rest."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "The man simply nods, his long blond..."
links.text: The man simply nods, his long blond hair falling on his shoulders.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes, officer. I'm very glad we're..."
links.text: "Yes, officer. I'm very glad we're getting a chance to speak about it candidly, man to man."

links.title: You: ""I'm listening.""
links.text: "I'm listening."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Well, the Seolites -- they're a ve..."
links.text: "Well, the Seolites -- they're a very smart people. Smart and secretive. Most think they have isolated themselves on their landmass because they disdain to mingle with the rest of us..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm not saying that *you* think th..."
links.text: "I'm not saying that *you* think that too. You seem like an incisive man, officer. You must be, being a detective."

links.title: You: ""Yes, sir, I'm a regular Dick Mulle..."
links.text: "Yes, sir, I'm a regular Dick Mullen. But better, because I'm *real*."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "His eyes widen momentarily. "Right,..."
links.text: His eyes widen momentarily. "Right, of course you are. Well, as I was saying..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Even as Seol remains closed off fr..."
links.text: "Even as Seol remains closed off from the world, Seolite agents have been slowly advancing through the echelons of power on the other isolae."

links.title: You: ""I don't know how good of a detecti..."
links.text: "I don't know how good of a detective I am, really..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Those who are best at their job ar..."
links.text: "Those who are best at their job are almost always the most humble. But, as I was saying..."

links.title: You: ""Thank you, sir. It's not often tha..."
links.text: "Thank you, sir. It's not often that the RCM receives the recognition that it deserves."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""It's a shame, too. What would we a..."
links.text: "It's a shame, too. What would we all do without law enforcement. But, as I was saying..."

links.title: You: ""I sense that you might be trying t..."
links.text: "I sense that you might be trying to flatter me."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Perhaps I was presumptuous to sugg..."
links.text: "Perhaps I was presumptuous to suggest I knew anything about you, as we've only just met. My apologies. But, as I was saying..."

links.title: You: ""Right, sure. You were saying?""
links.text: "Right, sure. You were saying?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I was saying -- even as Seol remai..."
links.text: "I was saying -- even as Seol remains closed off from the world, Seolite agents have been slowly advancing through the echelons of power on the other isolae."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""They come as apparently well-meani..."
links.text: "They come as apparently well-meaning immigrants. Sometimes students -- they learn our *violin* and *cello*. But more often tech workers in cybernetics and similar advanced industries."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Seol is known for being technologic..."
links.text: Seol is known for being technologically advanced, although it is not entirely known how far they have progressed.

links.title: You: ""That seems harmless enough.""
links.text: "That seems harmless enough."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes, but consider: Seol is famous,..."
links.text: "Yes, but consider: Seol is famous, or shall I say, *infamous*, for its spy tech. Don't you find it... convenient?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Seol is indeed famous for its advan..."
links.text: Seol is indeed famous for its advanced microtechnology, and for exporting it to foreign governments. Kijion Eendracht, the owner of Eendracht Airworks, is Seolite...

links.title: Logic: "It makes sense that a technological..."
links.text: It makes sense that a technologically advanced nation that produces a lot of *microtechnology* would have foreign governments as customers. That in itself doesn't prove anything.

links.title: You: ""But Seol makes their technology av..."
links.text: "But Seol makes their technology available for others."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes, it's the perfect way to creat..."
links.text: "Yes, it's the perfect way to create a false sense of security. They sell us fancy technology and then send in their experts, who pretend *not* to be experts..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""They play their violin and cello -..."
links.text: "They play their violin and cello -- oh, we like your music! -- or work in unrelated fields, like, say, law enforcement, where they have access to a *lot* of sensitive data..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""...and use their superior technolo..."
links.text: "...and use their superior technology to blackmail, mislead, and manipulate, turning high-ranking people in government and corporations into Seolite agents."

links.title: Half Light: "Could it be that someone is listeni..."
links.text: Could it be that someone is listening in on *this* conversation? Are there bugs in the reeds -- not only insects, but tiny Seolite bugs -- or maybe even some of the bugs *are bugged themselves*...

links.title: You: ""We must put an end to this. What c..."
links.text: "We must put an end to this. What can I do?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He leans in so close you can feel h..."
links.text: He leans in so close you can feel his lukewarm breath against your jaw. "Just do your part as an officer of the RCM."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""And keep an eye on that partner of..."
links.text: "And keep an eye on that partner of yours." He lets the silence linger, then concludes: "Good talk."

links.title: You: ""I don't buy this theory.""
links.text: "I don't buy this theory."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He pouts. "Most people don't... unt..."
links.text: He pouts. "Most people don't... until it's too late. You have been warned. Do with this warning what you will."

links.title: Empathy: "He's disappointed in you and sees n..."
links.text: He's disappointed in you and sees no point of arguing further.

links.title: You: ""I don't know how I feel about the..."
links.text: "I don't know how I feel about the Seolites knowing everything about me..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Terrifying, right?" He scowls. "Bu..."
links.text: "Terrifying, right?" He scowls. "But we've gotta keep doing the good work, officer. One day, when we're stronger..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""In the meantime, keep an eye on th..."
links.text: "In the meantime, keep an eye on that partner of yours..." He lets the silence linger, then concludes: "Good talk."

links.title: You: ""Gary, I feel like you bring out th..."
links.text: "Gary, I feel like you bring out the racist in me."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Officer, believe me, it's the Seol..."
links.text: "Officer, believe me, it's the Seolites who are the racists. They consider themselves superior to the rest of us -- and, thus, entitled to pull the strings of power around the world."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""So, keep an eye on that partner of..."
links.text: "So, keep an eye on that partner of yours..." He lets the silence linger, then concludes: "Our talk here is concluded. It's not *safe* to discuss this anymore."

links.title: You: ""You're blowing this out of proport..."
links.text: "You're blowing this out of proportion. The Seolites have better things to do."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Better things than take over the w..."
links.text: "Better things than take over the whole world on the sly? Sure you tell yourself that." He looks around, shadily. "Our talk here is concluded. It's not *safe* to discuss this anymore."

links.title: Empathy: "He's disappointed in you and sees n..."
links.text: He's disappointed in you and sees no point of arguing further.

links.title: You: ""This is a lot of new information...."
links.text: "This is a lot of new information. I'll have to think about it, consult with my partner..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Please, be careful!" He waves his..."
links.text: "Please, be careful!" He waves his hands energetically. "Don't let on that you know about the Seolite Conspiracy. Who knows what he might do to you..."

links.title: You: ""It's only logical. Seol is known f..."
links.text: "It's only logical. Seol is known for its advanced technology and exports whatever is most profitable."

links.title: You: ""I find it alarming.""
links.text: "I find it alarming."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes. They sell us fancy technology..."
links.text: "Yes. They sell us fancy technology and then send in their experts, who pretend not to be experts..."

links.title: You: ""I think I see where you're going w..."
links.text: "I think I see where you're going with this..."

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure I like what you're im..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I like what you're implying, but go on."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Well, you see... They sell us fanc..."
links.text: "Well, you see... They sell us fancy technology and then send in their experts, who pretend not to be experts..."

links.title: You: ""It sounds like their presence coul..."
links.text: "It sounds like their presence could contribute to economic growth and prosperity."

links.title: You: ""And you think there's a problem wi..."
links.text: "And you think there's a problem with this?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Consider, though: Seol is famous,..."
links.text: "Consider, though: Seol is famous, or shall I say, infamous, for its spy tech. Don't you find it... convenient?"

links.title: You: ""It seems dangerous that immigrants..."
links.text: "It seems dangerous that immigrants would go into fields that affect information technology."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Precisely. Seol is famous, or shal..."
links.text: "Precisely. Seol is famous, or shall I say, infamous, for its spy tech. Don't you find it... convenient?"

links.title: You: ""Get on with it, then.""
links.text: "Get on with it, then."

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure I like where this is..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I like where this is heading, but I'm willing to hear you out."

links.title: Drama: "His smile, meant to convey total op..."
links.text: His smile, meant to convey total openness, is that of an experienced salesman.

links.title: You: "Why's he shifting around like that?..."
links.text: Why's he shifting around like that? Analyze Gary's composure.

links.title: Composure: "That shirt looks *very* uncomfortab..."
links.text: That shirt looks *very* uncomfortable on him. Look at the buttons, barely keeping that thing together -- as if something is ready to *rip out* from underneath.

links.title: You: "His massive musculature?"
links.text: His massive musculature?

links.title: Composure: "No, he's scrawny. Try again."
links.text: No, he's scrawny. Try again.

links.title: You: "Something worn underneath it?"
links.text: Something worn underneath it?

links.title: Composure: "Yes. Like a piece of ceramic armour..."
links.text: Yes. Like a piece of ceramic armour, for example. One that makes a clicking sound when the plates meet each other, resembling pearls or marbles. Stolen from the corpse in the yard near where he lives.

links.title: You: ""I see you're a connoisseur of high..."
links.text: "I see you're a connoisseur of high-quality combat gear."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I knew you'd figure it out, office..."
links.text: "I knew you'd figure it out, officer." He sighs heavily. "I'm sorry I didn't tell you at once. I was..." He unbuttons the shirt.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I was ashamed of what I did. And I..."
links.text: "I was ashamed of what I did. And I didn't want you to know." You see gleaming white ceramic shine underneath -- a thin layer of interlocking plates covers his gaunt torso.

links.title: Drama: "We're not detecting falsehoods, sir..."
links.text: We're not detecting falsehoods, sire. He's gearing up to admit the truth.

links.title: Empathy: "This *shame* is surprisingly sincer..."
links.text: This *shame* is surprisingly sincere.

links.title: Lena, the Cryptozoologist's wife: ""Gary, what's going on?""
links.text: "Gary, what's going on?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I took the hanged man's cuirass. I..."
links.text: "I took the hanged man's cuirass. I... I didn't mean to."

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""Goddamit, Gary...""
links.text: "Goddamit, Gary..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I know.""
links.text: "I know."

links.title: Lena, the Cryptozoologist's wife: ""Shame on you! Give the cuirass to..."
links.text: "Shame on you! Give the cuirass to the officer at once!" The woman looks at you, her eyes soft and pleading.

links.title: Lena, the Cryptozoologist's wife: ""Gary didn't mean to interfere with..."
links.text: "Gary didn't mean to interfere with your investigation, officers, he's just... thick headed and poor as dirt. But he's always helped us, given us a place to stay. And he's followed Morell into god knows what jungles..."

links.title: Empathy: "He's a loyal friend."
links.text: He's a loyal friend.

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""GARY! WHAT'S GOING ON?!""
links.text: "GARY! WHAT'S GOING ON?!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""LATER, MORELL! I'VE GOT APOLOGIZIN..."
links.text: "LATER, MORELL! I'VE GOT APOLOGIZING TO DO."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- you've got *explaining* to d..."
links.text: "No -- you've got *explaining* to do." The lieutenant's tone is icy.

links.title: You: ""Give me that armour. Now.""
links.text: "Give me that armour. Now."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He sighs again, hangs his head, and..."
links.text: He sighs again, hangs his head, and unbuttons his shirt fully. A cuirass that matches the dead man's boots comes into view. Soon it is in your hands -- smelling of his sweat.

links.title: Interfacing: "But so, so light to hold. Like a ba..."
links.text: But so, so light to hold. Like a bag of cotton.

links.title: Endurance: "This is it. This will protect your..."
links.text: This is it. This will protect your mortal shell. Don it and live.

links.title: You: ""Why did you *really* put those clo..."
links.text: "Why did you *really* put those clothes in the trash?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Everyone was picking those pieces..."
links.text: "Everyone was picking those pieces off him and I was watching them do it. And they scattered his clothes all over the yard, everything was smelling..." He looks at his feet.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""So I went there to take out my tra..."
links.text: "So I went there to take out my trash and started cleaning up. All those rags on the ground, him swinging up there, and..." He swallows. "I had a lapse of honour, sir. I thought: He's a foreigner. They all say he wasn't from here."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Only the cuirass was left, so I st..."
links.text: "Only the cuirass was left, so I stripped it off him. It was early in the morning, no one saw me. I took it with me. It was a mistake. Had I known it'd give you guys' trouble, I wouldn't have..." His lips start quivering. "Fuck..."

links.title: Drama: "We're detecting sincere contrition..."
links.text: We're detecting sincere contrition here, sire. He's not trying to flatter anyone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay." The lieutenant jots so..."
links.text: "It's okay." The lieutenant jots something down in his notebook. "It was a loose end and you're tying it up now."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm so fucking sorry I called you..."
links.text: "I'm so fucking sorry I called you *Yellow Man*." He says silently. "Seolite officers commanded the Suzerain's navy. Most of them sided with the King, when..." He shakes his head.

links.title: Rhetoric: "They were thoroughly *conservative*..."
links.text: They were thoroughly *conservative* men, he realizes suddenly.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "It's difficult to say what the lieu..."
links.text: It's difficult to say what the lieutenant thinks of this historic apology. His face does not belie emotions.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm so fucking sorry I kept callin..."
links.text: "I'm so fucking sorry I kept calling you *yellow man* in my head." He says silently. "Seolite officers commanded the Suzerain's navy. Most of them sided with the King, when..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Why did you lie to me, Gary?""
links.text: "Why did you lie to me, Gary?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Because I was weak." He says, star..."
links.text: "Because I was weak." He says, staring at nothing in particular. "I should have told you the moment I saw you, but..."

links.title: Lena, the Cryptozoologist's wife: ""He's a scaredy cat." The woman loo..."
links.text: "He's a scaredy cat." The woman looks at Gary, her eyes motherly.

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""THE HELL, GARY?! YOU IN TROUBLE?""
links.text: "THE HELL, GARY?! YOU IN TROUBLE?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'll explain later..." He doesn't..."
links.text: "I'll explain later..." He doesn't muster up the strength to yell.

links.title: You: ""Do you know who killed the hanged..."
links.text: "Do you know who killed the hanged man?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I always thought it was the Union,..."
links.text: "I always thought it was the Union, but... I sure as hell won't go around saying that anymore. You have my word. I don't know -- and I won't be running my mouth on this subject anymore."

links.title: Drama: "This is all he knows."
links.text: This is all he knows.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I always thought it was the Union...."
links.text: "I always thought it was the Union... some Union hard-asses. Lynched him because of the strike. But almost everyone in town knows that. I wish I could tell you more..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Are we done here, Gary?" (Conclude..."
links.text: "Are we done here, Gary?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yes. Absolutely. I will *never* do..."
links.text: "Yes. Absolutely. I will *never* do anything like this again." He looks around, relieved of some burden, his mouth still quivering.

links.title: Composure: "It sounds like he's wearing some ki..."
links.text: It sounds like he's wearing some kind of armour under his clothes -- you can't tell it's there just from looking at him. Probably stolen from the corpse in the yard near where he lives.

links.title: Composure: "Okay, he keeps shifting uncomfortab..."
links.text: Okay, he keeps shifting uncomfortably, but you can't make head or tail of this sound -- and honestly it's rude to stare, so stop.

links.title: Composure: "Is he? He's looking comfortable eno..."
links.text: Is he? He's looking comfortable enough -- maybe it was just beads? Sounded like beads. But what kind of beads might a man like Gary be hiding beneath his clothes?

links.title: You: ""Gary, are you cross-dressing by an..."
links.text: "Gary, are you cross-dressing by any chance?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Why would I do that, officer?" He..."
links.text: "Why would I do that, officer?" He furrows his eyebrows.

links.title: You: ""To feel closer to the fair sex. Ai..."
links.text: "To feel closer to the fair sex. Ain't no shame in it, man!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""But, officer…" He shakes his head..."
links.text: "But, officer…" He shakes his head slowly. "I'm not wearing any women's clothes."

links.title: You: ""Because you're a dangerous subvers..."
links.text: "Because you're a dangerous subversive, obviously."

links.title: You: ""To explode the gender binary. You..."
links.text: "To explode the gender binary. You should be more open about your views, though. Let those beads hang out."

links.title: You: ""Are those prayer beads I keep hear..."
links.text: "Are those prayer beads I keep hearing?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I don't pray, officer. Faith in no..."
links.text: "I don't pray, officer. Faith in non-existent helpers is a sign of weakness. Not for proper Revacholian men such as ourselves."

links.title: You: ""Are you currently sporting some *a..."
links.text: "Are you currently sporting some *anal beads*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant leans in confidentia..."
links.text: The lieutenant leans in confidentially. "You wouldn't be able to hear if he were wearing anal beads," he whispers.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please excuse my colleague's humou..."
links.text: "Please excuse my colleague's humour. Working this murder case is taking a toll on us both. You don't *quite* have to answer that -- yet."

links.title: Rhetoric: "What he means is: working on the ca..."
links.text: What he means is: working on the case is taking a toll on *you*, and working with you is taking a toll on *him*.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Of course, of course." He forces a..."
links.text: "Of course, of course." He forces a grin, no doubt hiding some *colossal* anal beads up his butt as he does so.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Good one. Yeah, good one officer."..."
links.text: "Good one. Yeah, good one officer." He forces a grin. "You really have a courageous sense of humour."

links.title: You: ""So, Gary, you live nearby. In an a..."
links.text: "So, Gary, you live nearby. In an apartment in Martinaise?" (Point in its direction.)

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Sure do, officer.""
links.text: "Sure do, officer."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "His eyes narrow slightly. He's wond..."
links.text: His eyes narrow slightly. He's wondering where this is going.

links.title: You: ""Have you found your door open late..."
links.text: "Have you found your door open lately?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""In my home, yes, when I was going..."
links.text: "In my home, yes, when I was going to..." His face turns pale. "How did you *know?*"

links.title: You: ""Mr. Evrart Claire thought it neces..."
links.text: "Mr. Evrart Claire thought it necessary to unlock your apartment."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Mr. Claire unlocked my apartment?""
links.text: "Mr. Claire unlocked my apartment?"

links.title: You: ""No, I did. Took a look around, too.""
links.text: "No, I did. Took a look around, too."

links.title: You: ""No, I did. Don't worry, I didn't g..."
links.text: "No, I did. Don't worry, I didn't go in." (Lie.)

links.title: You: ""No, *I* did, per his request.""
links.text: "No, *I* did, per his request."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Don't worry, I didn't go in..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Don't worry, I didn't go in."

links.title: You: ""I opened it for Mr. Claire. Figure..."
links.text: "I opened it for Mr. Claire. Figured I'd also take a look around."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""So you work for Evrart Claire!" He..."
links.text: "So you work for Evrart Claire!" He realizes what's going on and changes his tone: "Officer, please tell him we're good. No, no, tell him I'll make it up to him..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""What have I done? He'll send the m..."
links.text: "What have I done? He'll send the muscle after me..." The man looks around, whispering, he makes sure no one hears you talk.

links.title: Composure: "As he lowers his tone he hunches hi..."
links.text: As he lowers his tone he hunches his back.

links.title: You: ""Really, I don't even know what it..."
links.text: "Really, I don't even know what it was about, I just opened the door."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Whatever it is, tell him I'm silen..."
links.text: "Whatever it is, tell him I'm silent as the grave." The man thinks. "I was probably talking too loud in the Whirling the other night, about some theories..."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I won't do it again." He looks aro..."
links.text: "I won't do it again." He looks around nervously. "If there's anything I can do to assist you -- or the Union -- just ask, okay? I'll try to help if I can."

links.title: You: ""Relax. Evrart doesn't like the art..."
links.text: "Relax. Evrart doesn't like the article you wanted to write. Don't write it and it'll will be fine."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""The article about the businesses?..."
links.text: "The article about the businesses? How does he know..." He shakes his head. "No way in *hell* I'm writing it now. Tell him I'm silent as the grave."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I won't cause any more trouble," h..."
links.text: "I won't cause any more trouble," he whispers. "I'll be Mr. Cooperation. The Union doesn't have to worry about me -- they're honest Vacholieres. Honest men."

links.title: You: ""Honestly, I feel bad about it. The..."
links.text: "Honestly, I feel bad about it. The article you wanted to write -- don't let this dissuade you from writing it."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't know what it was, bu..."
links.text: "Yeah, I don't know what it was, but he doesn't like you."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I was probably talking too loud in..."
links.text: "I was probably talking too loud in the Whirling the other night, about some theories... Stupid... Shouldn't have run my mouth loud like that."

links.title: You: ""Try not to shit yourself Gary. It'..."
links.text: "Try not to shit yourself Gary. It's just an open door."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""What could it be about?" He frets..."
links.text: "What could it be about?" He frets to himself, not taking your advice. "I probably talked too loud. In the Whirling. About some theories I had. Whatever it is, I'm done with it."

links.title: You: "(Nod grimly). "Our discussion on th..."
links.text: (Nod grimly). "Our discussion on this topic is over, Gary."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Of course. Of course." He looks ar..."
links.text: "Of course. Of course." He looks around nervously. "I won't do it again. If there's anything I can do to assist you -- or the Union -- just ask, okay? I'll try to help if I can."

links.title: Half Light: "This scared him proper. He's positi..."
links.text: This scared him proper. He's positively *melting* from fear. Has to prop himself up with a lot of anger to keep it together.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The weather vane has turned," the..."
links.text: "The weather vane has turned," the lieutenant remarks with a smirk. "He cannot be un-turned."

links.title: Empathy: "He clearly liked his squirming. He..."
links.text: He clearly liked his squirming. He may even have changed his mind about the whole door-opening operation.

links.title: Half Light: "This scared him proper. He's positi..."
links.text: This scared him proper. He's positively *melting* from fear. Has to prop himself up with a lot of anger to keep it together.

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Just wanted to ask if you..."
links.text: "Nothing. Just wanted to ask if your door's been unlocked lately. Now I have."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Is this about... the Union? Did th..."
links.text: "Is this about... the Union? Did the big man open the door?"

links.title: You: ""And you're a big Man from Hjelmdal..."
links.text: "And you're a big Man from Hjelmdall fan?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""How...?" The colour drains from hi..."
links.text: "How...?" The colour drains from his face.

links.title: You: ""Mr. Evrart Claire thought it neces..."
links.text: "Mr. Evrart Claire thought it necessary to unlock your apartment."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Mr. Claire unlocked my apartment?""
links.text: "Mr. Claire unlocked my apartment?"

links.title: You: ""I saw the poster in your apartment..."
links.text: "I saw the poster in your apartment. You know, I'm a Hjelmdallermann fan myself."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""But... why were you in my apartmen..."
links.text: "But... why were you in my apartment, officer?"

links.title: You: ""Just doing Mr. Claire a small favo..."
links.text: "Just doing Mr. Claire a small favour."

links.title: You: ""Mr. Evrart Claire asked me to get..."
links.text: "Mr. Evrart Claire asked me to get your door open. I figured I'd take a look around while I was at it."

links.title: You: ""I saw that ridiculous poster in yo..."
links.text: "I saw that ridiculous poster in your apartment, along with all your other colonialist memorabilia."

links.title: You: ""Mr. Claire must be very angry with..."
links.text: "Mr. Claire must be very angry with you."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Mr. Evrart...?" The colour drains..."
links.text: "Mr. Evrart...?" The colour drains from his face.

links.title: You: ""Yes, he insisted that I open the d..."
links.text: "Yes, he insisted that I open the door to your apartment."

links.title: You: ""I think I broke into your apartmen..."
links.text: "I think I broke into your apartment. I'm very sorry."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""What?!" He turns pale."
links.text: "What?!" He turns pale.

links.title: You: ""I had to. For Mr. Claire. I'm a ba..."
links.text: "I had to. For Mr. Claire. I'm a bad cop, I know, but I felt like I had to do it..."

links.title: You: ""Yes, Mr. Claire really wanted me t..."
links.text: "Yes, Mr. Claire really wanted me to open your door. And then I couldn't help looking around. Please accept my apologies."

links.title: You: ""We'll return to this later. For no..."
links.text: "We'll return to this later. For now, let me ask you something else."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Of course. Of course.""
links.text: "Of course. Of course."

links.title: You: ""So how about that topping pie?""
links.text: "So how about that topping pie?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I thought you'd forgotten! I happe..."
links.text: "I thought you'd forgotten! I happen to have one on me right now." He smiles broadly as he walks behind the bar and takes a large, flat box out of a black bag. "It should still be warm."

links.title: You: ""What's on it?""
links.text: "What's on it?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Meatless bacon, avocado, glazed fi..."
links.text: "Meatless bacon, avocado, glazed figs, basil, and tiny chunks of pineapple, seasoned with lime zest, freshly ground pepper -- and just a pinch of paprika for the officer!"

links.title: You: ""That sounds too fancy for an offic..."
links.text: "That sounds too fancy for an officer of the law."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Revachol's protectors ought to enj..."
links.text: "Revachol's protectors ought to enjoy Revachol's best topping pie!" He smiles broadly.

links.title: You: ""Yummm. I can taste it already!""
links.text: "Yummm. I can taste it already!"

links.title: You: ""What kind of devilry is this?""
links.text: "What kind of devilry is this?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He chuckles. "Not devilry, just Rev..."
links.text: He chuckles. "Not devilry, just Revachol's best topping pie!"

links.title: You: ""No need to know what's on it. Just..."
links.text: "No need to know what's on it. Just give it to me."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Enjoy." He smiles broadly."
links.text: "Enjoy." He smiles broadly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant mumbles. "F..."
links.text: "Great." The lieutenant mumbles. "First the sandwich, now a pie..."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for your cooperation." [..."
links.text: "Thank you for your cooperation." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello again! Very generous of you..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again! Very generous of you to help us out, officer. I can't wait to get out of here."

links.title: You: ""Not a lover of the great outdoors?""
links.text: "Not a lover of the great outdoors?"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I like nature, just not this blood..."
links.text: "I like nature, just not this bloody coast. It's mostly drunks and degenerates that come here."

links.title: Drama: "Degenerates? This man respects auth..."
links.text: Degenerates? This man respects authority too much to see the truth inscribed upon thine own visage. Pretend thou art a paragon of virtue.

links.title: You: ""I am neither of those things, I ca..."
links.text: "I am neither of those things, I can assure you. I'm a by-the-books, clean-as-a-whistle officer of the law. I'm not even tempted to touch intoxicants."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: "He nods gravely. "I've been tempted..."
links.text: He nods gravely. "I've been tempted on occasion. But someone has to stay strong for Revachol." His gaze shifts to the pile of soggy logs at his feet.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He pronounces 'Revachol' with a har..."
links.text: He pronounces 'Revachol' with a hard 'k,' unlike other people.

links.title: You: ""Degenerates? I've been trained to..."
links.text: "Degenerates? I've been trained to identify the slightest hint of degeneracy by the pre-eminent authority on it."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, uh... I didn't mean it in any..."
links.text: "Oh, uh... I didn't mean it in any *scientific* way." His gaze shifts nervously to the pile of soggy logs at his feet.

links.title: Authority: "*Serious* question time. This man i..."
links.text: *Serious* question time. This man is no innocent. No one is.

links.title: You: ""Drunks and degenerates -- that's m..."
links.text: "Drunks and degenerates -- that's my crew!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Dark times will do that to good me..."
links.text: "Dark times will do that to good men." He nods gravely, then shifts his gaze to the pile of soggy logs at his feet.

links.title: You: ""Sadly, I think I might be a drunk...."
links.text: "Sadly, I think I might be a drunk. Or a degenerate. Maybe even both."

links.title: You: ""Nobody's perfect. I'm sure you've..."
links.text: "Nobody's perfect. I'm sure you've been tempted to drink."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Oh, I've been tempted." He nods gr..."
links.text: "Oh, I've been tempted." He nods gravely. "But someone has to stay strong for Revachol." His gaze shifts to the pile of soggy logs at his feet.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He pronounces 'Revachol' with a har..."
links.text: He pronounces 'Revachol' with a hard k, unlike other people.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm more of a city boy too.""
links.text: "Yeah, I'm more of a city boy too."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello again! How do you do, office..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again! How do you do, officer? I'm *still* waiting for Mr. F-ing Field Research over there to be done with his traps."

links.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""I HEARD THAT, GARY!""
links.text: "I HEARD THAT, GARY!"

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO!" Gary grimac..."
links.text: "YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO!" Gary grimaces, examining the dirt under his fingernails.

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello! I'm Gary. Very generous of..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello! I'm Gary. Very generous of you to help us out, officer."

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim...."
links.text: "Yellow Man!" He turns toward Kim. "I mean... officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises his eyebrows..."
links.text: The lieutenant raises his eyebrows slightly and takes out his notebook.

links.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""I'm just waiting for my friend Mor..."
links.text: "I'm just waiting for my friend Morell to finish up with his insect traps so we can return to civilization."

dialogueTree.title: Gary, the Cryptofascist: ""Hello! I'm Gary. How do you do, of..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello! I'm Gary. How do you do, officer?"
